EmailTemplate.subject: Forefront - Issue #2 - Peace River
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
#2 April 2013 - Forefront - Interactive PDF - Americas Project Focus [1]AECOM
Principal engineer Doug Eckmann, P.E., takes us on an interactive tour of one of AECOM's projects:
Peace River Regional Water Supply project DeSoto County, Florida, U.S.A. "This project...is a tribute to the skill and creativity of the AECOM engineers and Authority staff who made it happen." [2]Download PDF (3mb)
Interactive PDF Click the button above to download a 3Mb interactive PDF. Accept full screen mode and enjoy this issue of Forefront.
About Forefront Forefront interactive e-magazine is a quarterly publication rich in multimedia content that showcases AECOM's innovation, people and passion.
